intro: Inquisitive and efficient Junior Full Stack Web Developer with a focus on smart algorithms and interactive user experiences. Certified in Full Stack Web Development, Python, IT Support and pursuing a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science. Inspired by the possibilities that new technologies and innovation bring with a lifelong love for learning and compounding knowledge. Proficient in the MERN Stack and looking for a role in which to learn, grow, and contribute.
skills: APIs, Agile Methodologies, Algorithms, Bootstrap, BrightScript (Roku), C, CSS, Command Line Interface (CLI), Data Structures, Express, Git, Git Flow, GraphQL, HTML, JSON, JavaScript (ES6), Jest Testing, MVC Pattern, MongoDB, Mongoose, MySQL, Node, Object Oriented Programming (OOP), Progressive Web Applications (PWAs), Python, REST Architecture, React, React-Router, Redux, Regex, SASS/SCSS, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Sequelize, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE), Test Driven Development (TDD)
tools: Adobe Illustrator, Figma, Firebase, Firefox, GitHub, Google Chrome, Google Suite, Heroku, Lighthouse Testing, MacOS, Microsoft Office, Safari, Virtual Machines (VMs), Windows

details: Maintain high attention to detail and manage time wisely to support smooth store operations.
Think calmly under pressure – during high customer volume – to handle challenges as they arise.
Excel at communicating with coworkers and customers ensuring legendary customer service.
Responsible for the execution and coordination of retail brand exhibits at trade shows.
Coordinated with clients, sales teams, and supervisors to ensure highest possible quality.
Adapted to project changes and client requests with high attention to detail.
Produced daily reports which highlighted successes and areas for improvement.

studies.program: Certificate – Full Stack Web Development (240 Hours + 17 Projects)
Associate of Science – Sound and Music Technology
